description: The Cake script analyzer and code generator.
summary: Cake (C# Make) is a build automation system with a C# DSL to do things like compiling code, copy files/folders, running unit tests, compress files and build NuGet packages.
author: Patrik Svensson,  Mattias Karlsson,  Gary Ewan Park,  Alistair Chapman,  Martin Björkström,  Dave Glick,  Pascal Berger and contributors
